location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to Bazett Doveton, Military Accountant, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that Lieutenant Strong, Commanding the Escort at the Bushire Residency had received his arrears of pay and allowance for the ten months from 1 March to 31 December 1826. The letter goes on to state that there had been a delay in sending the abstracts as Lieutenant Nesbitt Strong had left Bombay without a pay cerfiicate which had only arrived in Bushire two months ago, by which time the Lieutenant was on leave in the interior (of Persia) and only returned on 4 January 1827.
